Text: Thanks for another UL eztv! BTW what's going on with your site?

Anyway... thanks for the up, as usual!!

@ZenRhino - Season 2 was split into two halves. This is the second half of season two. 

Eztv has been down for me as well for quite a while now. (in the US)
